definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The curtain will then open, permitting you to see if you selected the correct curtain.
sentences.chinese: 幕布然后会开启，让你看到你是否选择正确。

sentences.english: Cover of Darkness blankets all under the reign of the Necromancers .
sentences.chinese: 黑暗的幕布遮盖了亡灵法师统治的地区。

sentences.english: "You had better stay till the curtain is hung, " interposed Mrs.
sentences.chinese: “你最好等幕布挂上以后再去，”诺里斯太太插嘴说。

sentences.english: Sombre stone houses were bright with hanging draperies.
sentences.chinese: 幽暗的石彻房屋，由于悬着幕布而显得色彩鲜艳。

sentences.english: Cover of Darkness blankets all under the reign of the Necromancers.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗的幕布遮盖了亡灵法师统治的地区。

sentences.english: It all seemed to him to have disappeared as though behind the curtain of a theatre.
sentences.chinese: 他感到所有这一切好象都消失在剧院的一块幕布后面。

sentences.english: Someone was pacing back and forth behind the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 有人正在幕布后踱来踱去。

sentences.english: As the curtain rises,a garden is seen on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 幕布拉开时，一个花园呈现在舞台。

sentences.english: The earliest shadow theatre screens were made of mulberry paper.
sentences.chinese: 早期皮影戏幕布是用桑皮纸制成的。

sentences.english: The theater department raised money to buy new curtains for the stage.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧系筹钱购买舞台的新幕布。

sentences.english: Your task is to click on the curtain that you feel has the picture behind it.
sentences.chinese: 你的任务是点击你觉得有图片在后面的幕布。

sentences.english: If you shine light through a slide using a projector, you can make the photograph appear on a screen.
sentences.chinese: 用幻灯机放映幻灯片可将图像投射到幕布上。

definition: hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
